verbs.description: [ARG0: french oil giant total] pulls out of iran [ARG0: iran oil minister] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on monday] [ARG1: that france oil giant total sa has officially pulled out of iran after cancelling its 5 billion 20-year agreement to dev iran]
